rotate_rotor_faster.description: Rotate the rotor at a quicker pace to adjust the fan to a higher speed.

rotate_rotor_slower.description: Rotate the rotor slower to adjust the fan to a lower speed.

check_rotor.description: Check the rotation of rotor to verify the fan function.

rotate_rotor.description: Rotate the rotor to adjust the fan speed.

press_button_to_turn_on.description: Press the button to switch on the fan.

double_press_button.description: Press the button twice to toggle between the fan settings.

clean_button.description: Clean the button to ensure proper functioning and hygiene.

press_button_to_turn_off.description: Press the button to turn off the fan.

press_button.description: Press the button to turn on/off the fan.

check_frame.description: Examine the fan frame for any damage or need for cleaning.

wipe_fan_frame_thoroughly.description: Clean the fan frame more thoroughly to ensure no dust is left behind.

wipe_fan_frame.description: Wipe the fan frame to ensure it is dust-free.

clean_fan_frame.description: Clean the fan frame to remove dust or any other particles.

check_fan_frame.description: Check if fan frame is clean or not.

complete_clean.description: Clean every part of the fan including the rotor, frame, and button.

press_and_check.description: Press the button to check the fan's functionality and examine the rotation.

clean_fan_rotor_and_frame.description: Clean the rotor and frame of the fan to remove dust or dirt.

check_and_turn_off_fan.description: Check if the fan is running and press the button to turn it off.

clean_whole_fan.description: Clean the entire fan including the rotor, button and fan frame.

check_whole_fan.description: Check if the entire fan is clean or not.

spin_rotor_and_press_button.description: Spin the rotor manually and press the button.
